name: Mini Power-Cade
description:
Your basically a millennial who can't get off their phone. There are a series of mini-games which you must complete but every time you interact with your phone you lose some power. You can recharge your phone to keep playing by dragging the mouse within the charge pad. Failing to complete a mini-game will result in a game over. How long can you last?

If playing standalone anything above HD (1920x1080)
